div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 332 Limani-Chersonisou, near Cherso- nesus, Crete, 1942 Burial: c. 90-80 B.C. (Le Rider, T); c. 75-70 (Lewis) Contents: 97+ AR. Pot hoard Lysimachus: 11 late post. tetradr. (Byzantium) Athens: 63 New Style tetradr. Arcadia, Crete: 1 tetradr. (over Seleucid issue) Cnossus: 12 tetradr. (some over Seleucid issues) Lyttus: 6 tetradr. Mithradates VI: 1 tetradr. (later addition?) Nicomedes IV: 2 tetradr. Tenedos: 1 tetradr. Disposition: Herakleion 23; New York 70; Boston 1 (Lyttus); Paris 1 (Lyttus) Thompson, Athens (Cretan Hoard II), pp. 511-3, illus.; NC 1962, pp. 316-7 Lewis, NC 1962, p. 282 † Le Rider, Monn. crét., pp. 269-85, illus. Price, NC 1968, pp. 9-10 Pollak, ANSMN 16 (1970), pp. 54-5, notes 24,27
